configuration:
dfs.nameservices ${fs_defaultFS}
dfs.ha.namenodes.asda
${dfs_ha_namenodes_asda}
${dfs_namenode_address}
dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir
qjournal://${dfs_journalnode_shared}/${fs_defaultFS}
dfs.journalnode.edits.dir ${hadoop_home}/data/journal
dfs.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.asda org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha.ConfiguredFailoverProxyProvider
dfs.ha.fencing.methods
sshfence shell(/bin/true)
dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.private-key-files ${hadoop_home}/.ssh/id_rsa
dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.connect-timeout 30000
dfs.replication 3
dfs.namenode.data.dir ${hadoop_home}/data/namenode
dfs.datanode.data.dir ${hadoop_home}/data/datanode
